title: "Can Trance Dreaming Help with Too Much Daydreaming? Tips and Exercises to Facilitate Hypnotic Dreaming and Self-Understanding"
first_phrase: In the previous text, the authors discussed various techniques to handle trance dreaming and prevent daydreaming from taking over. The last 200 tokens introduce an exercise that aims at facilitating dreaming for people who either experience hypervigilance or have difficulty experiencing dreams. The exercise involves relaxation, visualization, and stepping into the imagined scene, facilitating hypnotic dreaming and aiding self-understanding. The authors emphasize the importance of acknowledging dreams and preventing them from taking control automatically. This approach separates the observer/creator from the dreaming child, increasing awareness in the present world.
content: See the difference between you (observer/creator) and the dreaming child. Facilitating Trance Dreaming This exercise is constructed to facilitate dreaming for people who are unable to experience this phenomenon, or for people that are hypervigilant. Step 1 - Relax. Move into a comfortable place and begin to imagine different, pleasurable scenes: woods, mountains, oceans, favorite people, etc. Trance Dreaming â€¢ 109 Step 3 - Experience. Step into the scene, and feel what it feels like to be a part of the dream. Step 4 - Before Bed. Prior to going to sleep, ask yourself to allow dreams to happen and be remembered. Sometimes people report asking for solutions to problems and receiving the answer, utilizing this technique. As an exercise, write down the first conscious thought upon awakening. The accu- racy or insight of the communication may be a surprise. All these exercises facilitate the increased skill and awareness of hypnotic dreaming, to aid in self-understanding. Summary What cannot be over-emphasized is that dreams are not wrong. They are disruptive when they get out of control and act automati- cally because the child within the adult loses the present-time world and the connection to the body.
last_phrase: In conclusion, trance dreaming is an effective technique for facilitating dreams and unleashing the potential of hypnotic dreaming for increased self-understanding. By observing and creating knowingly, we can distinguish between the observer/creator and the inner child in a dream state. With these simple steps, anyone can experience the power of their dreams and navigate their inner world.
